document.full_text: teen star demi lovato is leaving her disney channel hit show "sonny with a chance", saying that returning after treatment for bulimia and cutting herself would not be healthy for her recovery.
document.title: demi lovato quits disney tv show, talks of bulimia
lines_and_colors: teen star demi lovato is leaving her disney channel hit show "sonny with a chance", saying that returning after treatment for bulimia and cutting herself would not be healthy for her recovery.
